articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Fit for a prince: Denmark's Axelsen takes badminton gold - and royal call - CNA
articles.description: Denmark's Viktor Axelsen received royal approval after winning badminton gold on Monday (Aug 2) to break Asia's stranglehold, then warned he intends to reign over the sport for some time to come.
articles.content: TOKYO: Denmark's Viktor Axelsen received royal approval after winning badminton gold on Monday (Aug 2) to break Asia's stranglehold, then warned he intends to reign over the sport for some time to co… [+3669 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Denmark's Axelsen wins Olympic badminton gold - New Straits Times
articles.description: TOKYO: Denmark's Viktor Axelsen convincingly won Olympic badminton gold on Monday in Tokyo, becoming the first non-Asian man to claim the singles title since 1996.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Thai baht and Malaysian ringgit weaken as Covid-19 virus pandemic issues keep on rising - The Star Online
articles.description: Thailand's baht was on track for its worst session in two weeks on Monday, while Malaysia's ringgit was set to see its worst day in more than a week, as the two South-East Asian countries continued to battle a surge in coronavirus cases.
